"I can imagine how difficult this must be for you. It sounds like you're feeling really overwhelmed and emotionally drained. That can be such a tough place to be, and I want you to know that I'm here for you."

I understand that you feel embarrassed about making a mistake, but let me tell you something. Mistakes happen, and they are a part of life. Everyone makes mistakes, and it's how you handle them that matters.

Instead of beating yourself up over it, try to learn from it. Take a step back and analyze what went wrong, and how you can prevent it from happening again in the future. This way, you can turn a mistake into a learning experience, and become a better person because of it.

So, don't be too hard on yourself. Mistakes are a natural part of life, and they can actually make you stronger in the long run. So, don't worry about it, and just move on.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
